Inquiry.title: Inquiry
Inquiry.description: Represents an inquiry submitted through the contact form.

name.description: Name of the person submitting the inquiry.

email.description: Email address of the person submitting the inquiry.

company.description: Company of the person submitting the inquiry.

problemDescription.description: The detailed problem description or project idea.

routedTo.description: The team the inquiry was routed to by the AI.

routingReason.description: The reason for routing to a specific team.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the inquiry was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the inquiry (e.g., New, In Progress, Closed).

/inquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores all inquiries submitted through the contact form.
